CoinBundle airdrop

Get $10 worth of CoinBundle(BNDL) tokens just by signing in. You can also complete myltiple tasks to earn more.

How to claim and submit proof of work:

1. Signup with email address.

Go to the airdrop page to create an account with your email address, then check your email for the verification code and insert it in the corresponding field.

2. Verify your profile.

As soon as you enter the verification code you will see the following screen where you need to verify your profile following the given instructions.

3. Send corresponding proof of work.

Once your profile is verified, you'll see the following screen showing your welcome bonus. Please print this screen and attach it as proof of work. You will also receive a second email confirming your verified profile, please copy the whole text from this email (you can delete your personal data) and paste it as proof of work.

4. Optional and highly recommended.

Complete the tasks listed under the Airdrops tab to earn more tokens, you will also earn Beta Bucks which doesn't have underlying value but you can use them to place and practice crypto investments.

Additionally, you will receive 10.000 Beta Bucks daily for you to invest.

Although these investments don't have intrinsic value, you'll be participating in a contest in which you'll earn real tokens based on your investment performance.

Checkout more Airdrops you can start collecting right now and start building your portfolio out of free crypto. Follow us on twitter to stay updated.
